name: BOB-SQUISH(BETA)
description:
Using WASD keys to move the controller around, deform the moving terrain in order to use physics to push balls into colliding into other balls to rack up points. 

Glowing way-points are visible to pause to game using the RETURN key 

I only made this is 48 hours but I was thinking of doing a top down version where the user moves based on mouse input (following the mouse), and apply a bounciness to the deformity. Advise appreciated <3
